title: Dress
description: predominately black with bright colored embroidery, especially at shoulders, chest, and back; embroidery consists of geometric patterns; dress is open in front; bottom of dress has an inside lining that borders edges; blue and white lining on inside near neck opening; sleeves extend straight out from shoulders; panels of dress stitched together using red thread
creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in honor of Lotus Stack
